page.title: 04General Entertainment
page.content: As in the case of many rural areas there is very little in the way of entertaiment provided for the population.As a result there are a lo of clubs in the area,most of them concerned with sport but even these provide social events as well as sporting fixtures. There are oportunities to play cricke ,football,Badminton,skittles,darts,ar hery,swimming and netball.Also there are discussion groups,the Womens Institute the British Legion,the Historical Association,the Arts Group,the Pantomine,Society and the Bingo club as well as societies belonging to the churches. There is very little in the way of adult educetion so people go to Yeovi or Wincanton to attend evening classes.
